titles.title: A resolution designating the month of September as "National American History and Heritage Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 9/14/2006--Introduced. Designates September as National American History and Heritage Month. Recognizes with great appreciation the contributions of the millions of U.S. citizens who have devoted their lives, often at great sacrifice, to the improvement and preservation of the Nation, and those who continue to do so.
